# Resources

Adapted by UCD-SeRG team from [original by Jade Benjamin-Chung and Kunal Mishra](https://jadebc.github.io/lab-manual/resources.html)

## Resources for R

### Books and Comprehensive Guides

- R for Data Science [@wickham2023r4ds] - comprehensive introduction to doing data science with R
- R Packages [@wickham2023rpkgs] - complete guide to R package development
- Advanced R [@wickham2019advr] - deep dive into R programming and internals
- Mastering Shiny [@wickham2021shiny] - comprehensive guide to building web applications with Shiny
- Engineering Production-Grade Shiny Apps [@fay2021engineering] - best practices for production Shiny applications
- Happy Git and GitHub for the useR [@bryan2023happygit] - guide to using Git and GitHub with R
- [Jade's R-for-epi course](https://ucb-epi-r.github.io)

### UC Davis DataLab Workshops and Tutorials

The [UC Davis DataLab](https://github.com/ucdavisdatalab) provides extensive workshops and learning materials for data science:

- [Workshop Index](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/workshop_index/) - comprehensive catalog of all DataLab workshops
- [R Basics Workshop](https://github.com/ucdavisdatalab/workshop_r_basics) - foundational R programming for beginners
- [Research Toolkits](https://github.com/ucdavisdatalab/research-toolkits) - in-depth guides for research tools and methods
- [Install Guides](https://ucdavisdatalab.github.io/install_guides/) - setup instructions for data science software
